name: Failed Delivery
description:
Short first-person game about one pizza delivery. 

May contain horror elements (dark atmosphere and loud noises) and surely contains blood.

Made in 10 days for GameDev.tv GameJam 2022.

You can get source code at the link: Source Folder in Google Disk

You will have the opportunity to play as a deliveryman in a pizzeria and complete an order at night. But it's dangerous to go out at night in this dark area, so such a simple task at this time of day becomes a nightmare.

You can get list of controls at the pause menu in-game.
